channel.title: Conflict Resolution on Mianshi Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Conflict Resolution on Mianshi Handbook

item.title: Challenging Two-way Communication
item.description: Q: Give us an example of a time when establishing two-way communication with an individual or group was especially challenging.

item.title: Disagree With Your Supervisor
item.description: Q: What are some of the things you and your supervisor have disagreed on? Situation #1: in hiring a quality officer Disagree on: I: poor qualification Supervisor: better personality Consequence: I respected my supervisor. It turned out a good hire. Situation #2: Safety moment in the meeting Disagree with safety practice.
